channel.title: Posts on Allen Hu
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Allen Hu

item.title: 关于 About
item.description: Who Am I 关于我 Hello world! Here is Allen Hu, a computer science student at the University of California, Santa Barbara. As you can see, this blog is under construction and will improve gradually :-) 我叫Allen，出生在江南，后迁至深圳，现居圣塔芭芭拉——一座僻静安宁、美丽如画的海滨小城。 Reading 阅读 Reading is my biggest hobby. I believe that the god’s most precious gift to us is the ability to read and write.I enjoy reading. Writing Here I include coding into this topic. Writing, anyways, is a procedure of creating.
